languages.text: "Знаешь ли ты, мон-кай, что руками твоих сородичей столь многие из твоего племени расстались с жизнью? Я использовала вас, чтобы очистить ряды кабала от тех, кто начал мне мешать. Я использовала вас, чтобы достигнуть своих целей. Я вступила в сговор с тебе подобными — несмотря на всю вашу хваленую ненависть к ксеносам, что якобы не позволила бы вам даже подумать о подобном!"

"Do you know, mon-keigh, that so many of your kind have had their lives cut short at the hands of their own kin? I used you to purge the ranks of the Kabal, to clear all obstacles from my path. I used you to accomplish my goals. I colluded with your kind — despite your much-vaunted hatred of xenos, which ought to have prevented any of you from even considering such a thing!"
languages.original_text: "Знаешь ли ты, мон-кай, что руками твоих сородичей столь многие из твоего племени расстались с жизнью? Я использовала вас, чтобы очистить ряды кабала от тех, кто начал мне мешать. Я использовала вас, чтобы достигнуть своих целей. Я вступила в сговор с тебе подобными — несмотря на всю вашу хваленую ненависть к ксеносам, что якобы не позволила бы вам даже подумать о подобном!"

I used you to purge the ranks of the Kabal, to clear all obstacles from my path. I used you to accomplish my goals. I colluded with your kind — despite your much-vaunted hatred of xenos, which ought to have prevented any of you from even considering such a thing!"

I used you to accomplish my goals. I colluded with your kind — despite your much-vaunted hatred of xenos, which ought to have prevented any of you from even considering such a thing!"

I used you to accomplish my goals. I colluded with your kind — despite your much-vaunted hatred of xenos, which ought to have prevented any of you from even considering such a thing!"

"Do you know, mon-keigh, that so many of your kind have had their lives cut short at the hands of their own kin? I used you to purge the ranks of the Kabal, to clear all obstacles from my path. I used you to accomplish my goals. I colluded with your kind — despite your much-vaunted hatred of xenos, which ought to have prevented any of you from even considering such a thing!"

languages.text: “猴子，你知道你的族人之中，有多少人是被你们自己人害死的吗？我利用了你们，清洗了阴谋团的队伍，消灭了道路上的所有障碍。我利用你们实现了我的目标。尽管你们大肆宣扬对异形的仇恨，尽管你们之中根本不该有人愿意与我们合作，可你们的人依然在为我效力！”
languages.original_text: "Do you know, mon-keigh, that so many of your kind have had their lives cut short at the hands of their own kin? I used you to purge the ranks of the Kabal, to clear all obstacles from my path. I used you to accomplish my goals. I colluded with your kind — despite your much-vaunted hatred of xenos, which ought to have prevented any of you from even considering such a thing!"

traits.locale_text: “猴子，你知道你的族人之中，有多少人是被你们自己人害死的吗？我利用了你们，清洗了阴谋团的队伍，消灭了道路上的所有障碍。我利用你们实现了我的目标。尽管你们大肆宣扬对异形的仇恨，尽管你们之中根本不该有人愿意与我们合作，可你们的人依然在为我效力！”

languages.text: « Savez-vous, mon-keigh, que beaucoup des vôtres ont vu leur vie prendre fin aux mains de leurs propres congénères ? Je me suis servi de vous pour purger les rangs de la Kabale et pour éliminer les obstacles sur mon chemin. Je me suis servi de vous pour atteindre mon but. J'ai conspiré avec votre espèce, et ce, malgré votre haine notoire des xénos, qui aurait d'ailleurs dû vous empêcher de former la moindre alliance avec moi ! »
languages.original_text: "Do you know, mon-keigh, that so many of your kind have had their lives cut short at the hands of their own kin? I used you to purge the ranks of the Kabal, to clear all obstacles from my path. I used you to accomplish my goals. I colluded with your kind — despite your much-vaunted hatred of xenos, which ought to have prevented any of you from even considering such a thing!"

traits.locale_text: « Savez-vous, mon-keigh, que beaucoup des vôtres ont vu leur vie prendre fin aux mains de leurs propres congénères ? Je me suis servi de vous pour purger les rangs de la Kabale et pour éliminer les obstacles sur mon chemin. Je me suis servi de vous pour atteindre mon but. J'ai conspiré avec votre espèce, et ce, malgré votre haine notoire des xénos, qui aurait d'ailleurs dû vous empêcher de former la moindre alliance avec moi ! »

languages.text: «Mon-keigh, ¿sabías que muchos de los vuestros han muerto a manos de sus propios congéneres? Os he usado para purgar las filas de la Kábala y eliminar los obstáculos de mi camino. Os he usado para cumplir mis objetivos. He confabulado con vuestra especie, ¡a pesar de que vuestro tan cacareado odio hacia los xenos debería haber hecho impensable la mera idea!».
languages.original_text: "Do you know, mon-keigh, that so many of your kind have had their lives cut short at the hands of their own kin? I used you to purge the ranks of the Kabal, to clear all obstacles from my path. I used you to accomplish my goals. I colluded with your kind — despite your much-vaunted hatred of xenos, which ought to have prevented any of you from even considering such a thing!"

traits.locale_text: «Mon-keigh, ¿sabías que muchos de los vuestros han muerto a manos de sus propios congéneres? Os he usado para purgar las filas de la Kábala y eliminar los obstáculos de mi camino. Os he usado para cumplir mis objetivos. He confabulado con vuestra especie, ¡a pesar de que vuestro tan cacareado odio hacia los xenos debería haber hecho impensable la mera idea!».

languages.text: 「貴様の種族の多くが自らの同類の手で命を落としたことを知っているか、モン＝ケイ？私は陰謀団のメンバーを粛清し、眼前の障害をすべて排除するため、貴様を利用したのだ。目的を達するためにな。そして貴様の種族と手を組んだ。貴様たちはその異種族への大言壮語した憎しみから、そんなことは思いつきもしなかったろうがな！」
languages.original_text: "Do you know, mon-keigh, that so many of your kind have had their lives cut short at the hands of their own kin? I used you to purge the ranks of the Kabal, to clear all obstacles from my path. I used you to accomplish my goals. I colluded with your kind — despite your much-vaunted hatred of xenos, which ought to have prevented any of you from even considering such a thing!"

traits.locale_text: 「貴様の種族の多くが自らの同類の手で命を落としたことを知っているか、モン＝ケイ？私は陰謀団のメンバーを粛清し、眼前の障害をすべて排除するため、貴様を利用したのだ。目的を達するためにな。そして貴様の種族と手を組んだ。貴様たちはその異種族への大言壮語した憎しみから、そんなことは思いつきもしなかったろうがな！」

languages.text: "Wisst Ihr, Chem-Pan-Sey, dass so viele aus Eurem Volk durch ihre eigenen Verwandten getötet wurden? Ich habe Euch ausgenutzt, um die Reihen der Kabale zu säubern und alle Hindernisse aus meinem Weg zu räumen. Ich habe Euch ausgenutzt, um meine Ziele zu erreichen. Ich habe mit Eurem Volk konspiriert — trotz Eures vielgerühmten Hasses auf die Xenos, der jeden Chem-Pan-Sey davon hätte abhalten sollen, das überhaupt nur in Erwägung zu ziehen!"
languages.original_text: "Do you know, mon-keigh, that so many of your kind have had their lives cut short at the hands of their own kin? I used you to purge the ranks of the Kabal, to clear all obstacles from my path. I used you to accomplish my goals. I colluded with your kind — despite your much-vaunted hatred of xenos, which ought to have prevented any of you from even considering such a thing!"

traits.locale_text: "Wisst Ihr, Chem-Pan-Sey, dass so viele aus Eurem Volk durch ihre eigenen Verwandten getötet wurden? Ich habe Euch ausgenutzt, um die Reihen der Kabale zu säubern und alle Hindernisse aus meinem Weg zu räumen. Ich habe Euch ausgenutzt, um meine Ziele zu erreichen. Ich habe mit Eurem Volk konspiriert — trotz Eures vielgerühmten Hasses auf die Xenos, der jeden Chem-Pan-Sey davon hätte abhalten sollen, das überhaupt nur in Erwägung zu ziehen!"

languages.text: "Pek çok türdeşinin canının, kendi soydaşlarının elinde son bulduğunu biliyor muydun mon-keigh? Seni Kabal saflarını arındırmak için, yolumdaki tüm engelleri temizlemek için kullandım. Seni kendi amaçlarıma ulaşmak için kullandım. Meşhur zeno nefretiniz yüzünden hiçbiriniz buna olanak vermezken türünle gizlice anlaşmalar yaptım!"
languages.original_text: "Do you know, mon-keigh, that so many of your kind have had their lives cut short at the hands of their own kin? I used you to purge the ranks of the Kabal, to clear all obstacles from my path. I used you to accomplish my goals. I colluded with your kind — despite your much-vaunted hatred of xenos, which ought to have prevented any of you from even considering such a thing!"

traits.locale_text: "Türüne ait çok fazla kişinin yaşamının, kendi soydaşlarının elinde son bulduğunu biliyor musun mon-keigh? Seni Kabal saflarını arındırmak için, yolumdaki tüm engelleri temizlemek için kullandım. Seni kendi amaçlarıma ulaşmak için kullandım. Hiçbiriniz öyle bir ihtimali bile düşünmezken, o meşhur zeno nefretinize rağmen türünle gizlice anlaşmalar yaptım!"
